document.full_text: a fire broke out at japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, operator tokyo electric and power (tepco) said on tuesday, although flames and smoke were no longer visible.
document.title: fire seen at fukushima nuclear plant; flames no longer visible
lines_and_colors: a fire broke out at japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant, operator tokyo electric and power (tepco) said on tuesday, although flames and smoke were no longer visible.
